DOC.criteria: Healthy male female Aged 18 65 year , inclusive Body mass index ( BMI ) 18 32kg/m^2 inclusive Screening Nonsmoker tobacco/nicotine usage 30 day Screening Personal family history neurological , cardiovascular , renal , hepatic , metabolic , gastrointestinal endocrine abnormality Any clinical abnormality cardiovascular ( e.g. , blood pressure ) electrocardiogram ( ECG ) parameter Screening checkin
